title: Bound to Ares
description: When war comes to my city, there is nowhere to hide as a sea of our enemies comes crashing through the gates.When I’m saved from death, and taken by an enemy soldier, my first thought is of escape.But he isn’t an ordinary soldier. He is Ares—God of War. He claims that I am Bound to him because he saved me.I doubt he’s ever going to let me go. Now I find myself wondering, what does it mean to be Bound to the God of War?
author: Jessica Grayson
